events.message: We have received the application from the candidate expressing strong interest in the software engineer position.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering based on keywords like software engineer and developer experience.
A recruiter with technical knowledge was assigned to manage this candidate’s journey in the hiring pipeline.
Conducted an initial screening call to discuss candidate’s experience in software development and technical skills.
The candidate responded promptly and positively, illustrating enthusiasm for the technical challenges of the role.
Scheduled a technical interview to assess candidate’s coding skills and problem-solving abilities for the software engineer position.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong knowledge in software architecture and algorithms.
The HR interview was scheduled to evaluate the candidate’s cultural fit and discuss company policies and benefits.
Completed the HR interview where the candidate expressed alignment with company values and long-term career goals.
An offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive compensation and benefits tailored for the engineering role.
Received positive feedback from the candidate, confirming appreciation for the offer and the recruitment process.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer, expressing excitement to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process began, providing the new hire with all necessary resources and training schedules.
The hiring process was successfully closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering department.
